import React,{useState,useEffect,useRef}from'react';import{useSwipeable}from'react-swipeable';import Autosuggest from'react-autosuggest';import ScrollIntoView from'react-scroll-into-view-if-needed';import logo from'./components/logo.png';import backgroundImage from'./components/background.png';import particleGif from'./components/animations/particles.gif';import partners from'./components/autosuggest/partners.json';import speakersData from'./components/autosuggest/speakers.json';import addSpeakerIcon from'./components/icons/партнер.png';import'./FeedbackPage.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FeedbackPage=()=>{// ----- Шаг 1: Ввод названия партнёра -----
const[partner,setPartner]=useState('');const[partnerSuggestions,setPartnerSuggestions]=useState([]);const getPartnerSuggestions=value=>{const inputValue=(value||'').trim().toLowerCase();return inputValue.length<2?[]:partners.filter(p=>typeof p==='string'&&p.toLowerCase().includes(inputValue));};const handlePartnerChange=(e,_ref)=>{let{newValue}=_ref;setPartner(newValue);};const partnerInputProps={placeholder:'Введите название партнёра (например, ВТБ)',value:partner,onChange:handlePartnerChange,autoComplete:'off'};// ----- Рефы и обработка фокуса для подъёма содержимого при открытии клавиатуры -----
const containerRef=useRef(null);const nextButtonRef=useRef(null);const handleFocus=()=>{if(containerRef.current){containerRef.current.classList.add('keyboard-up');}// Задержка для того, чтобы клавиатура успела открыться
setTimeout(()=>{if(nextButtonRef.current){nextButtonRef.current.scrollIntoView({behavior:'smooth',block:'end'});}},300);};const handleBlur=()=>{if(containerRef.current){containerRef.current.classList.remove('keyboard-up');}};// ----- Шаг 2: Ввод ФИО спикера(ов) -----
const[speakersList,setSpeakersList]=useState([{fullName:'',id:1}]);const[speakersSuggestions,setSpeakersSuggestions]=useState([]);const getSpeakerSuggestions=value=>{const inputValue=(value||'').trim().toLowerCase();return inputValue.length<2?[]:speakersData.filter(s=>typeof s==='string'&&s.toLowerCase().includes(inputValue));};const handleSpeakerChange=(index,e,_ref2)=>{let{newValue}=_ref2;const updated=[...speakersList];updated[index].fullName=newValue;setSpeakersList(updated);};const handleAddSpeaker=()=>{setSpeakersList([...speakersList,{fullName:'',id:speakersList.length+1}]);};const speakerInputProps=index=>({placeholder:'Введите ФИО спикера (например, Иванов Иван)',value:speakersList[index].fullName,onChange:(e,_ref3)=>{let{newValue}=_ref3;return handleSpeakerChange(index,e,{newValue});},autoComplete:'off'});const handleFetchSpeakerSuggestions=_ref4=>{let{value}=_ref4;const suggestions=getSpeakerSuggestions(value);setSpeakersSuggestions(suggestions);};const handleClearSpeakerSuggestions=()=>{setSpeakersSuggestions([]);};// ----- Шаг 3: Оценка качеств спикера -----
const qualityRows=[{positive:'Экспертный',negative:'Компетентный'},{positive:'Энергичный',negative:'Пассивный'},{positive:'Мотивирующий',negative:'Невдохновляющий'},{positive:'Харизматичный',negative:'Душный'},{positive:'Доступно доносит информацию',negative:'Говорит сложными терминами'}];const[speakerQualities,setSpeakerQualities]=useState([]);const[currentSpeakerIndex,setCurrentSpeakerIndex]=useState(0);useEffect(()=>{setSpeakerQualities(speakersList.map(()=>Array(5).fill(null)));},[speakersList]);const handleQualitySelectForSpeaker=(rowIndex,type)=>{const updated=[...speakerQualities];updated[currentSpeakerIndex][rowIndex]=type;setSpeakerQualities(updated);};// ----- Шаг 4: Фактическая ценность информации -----
const[usefulness,setUsefulness]=useState('');const handleUsefulness=value=>setUsefulness(value);// ----- Шаг 5: Самые яркие мысли с мероприятия -----
const[brightThoughts,setBrightThoughts]=useState('');const handleBrightThoughtsChange=e=>setBrightThoughts(e.target.value);// ----- Шаг 6: Дополнительные предложения -----
const additionalOptions=['Практики','Клиентских историй','Статистических данных','Фишек продаж',"Перерывов / 'Кофе'-пауз",'Разбор продуктовой линейки','Детальный разбор параметров продукта','Ящик Prosecco'];const[additionalSelections,setAdditionalSelections]=useState([]);const toggleAdditionalSelection=option=>{if(additionalSelections.includes(option)){setAdditionalSelections(additionalSelections.filter(item=>item!==option));}else{setAdditionalSelections([...additionalSelections,option]);}};// ----- Шаг 7: Общее впечатление от тренинга -----
const[impression,setImpression]=useState('');const handleImpression=value=>setImpression(value);// ----- Логика шагов -----
const[currentStep,setCurrentStep]=useState(1);const[isFinished,setIsFinished]=useState(false);const[isFinishClicked,setIsFinishClicked]=useState(false);const canGoNext=()=>{if(currentStep===1){// Партнёр: введено и совпадает с JSON
return partner.trim()!==''&&partners.includes(partner);}if(currentStep===2){// Каждый спикер: имя не пустое и содержится в JSON (сравнение регистрозависимое)
return speakersList.every(s=>s.fullName.trim()!==''&&speakersData.includes(s.fullName));}if(currentStep===3){return speakerQualities[currentSpeakerIndex][0]!==null;}if(currentStep===4){return usefulness.trim()!=='';}if(currentStep===5){return brightThoughts.trim().length>=5;}if(currentStep===7){return impression.trim()!=='';}return true;};const handleNext=()=>{if(!canGoNext()){alert('Не выполнены условия для перехода к следующему шагу');return;}if(currentStep===3&&currentSpeakerIndex<speakersList.length-1){setCurrentSpeakerIndex(currentSpeakerIndex+1);return;}setCurrentStep(prev=>prev+1);};const handlePrev=()=>{if(currentStep>1){setCurrentStep(prev=>prev-1);}};const handleFinish=async()=>{if(!canGoNext()){alert('Не выполнены условия для завершения опроса');return;}if(isFinishClicked)return;setIsFinishClicked(true);setIsFinished(true);const positiveQualitiesList=[];const negativeQualitiesList=[];speakersList.forEach((speaker,idx)=>{qualityRows.forEach((row,j)=>{const selection=speakerQualities[idx][j];if(selection==='positive'){positiveQualitiesList.push(`${row.positive} (${speaker.fullName})`);}else if(selection==='negative'){negativeQualitiesList.push(`${row.negative} (${speaker.fullName})`);}});});const data={partner,speakers:speakersList.map(s=>s.fullName),answers:{speakerQualities,usefulness,brightThoughts,additionalSuggestions:additionalSelections,impression},dateTime:new Date().toISOString(),positiveQualities:positiveQualitiesList.join(', '),negativeQualities:negativeQualitiesList.join(', ')};try{const response=await fetch('https://rgszh-miniapp.org/api/feedback/save',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(data),credentials:'include'});if(!response.ok){alert('Ошибка при сохранении данных');}}catch(error){console.error('Ошибка при отправке данных:',error);alert('Ошибка соединения с сервером');}};// Свайпы для перехода между шагами
const swipeHandlers=useSwipeable({onSwipedLeft:()=>{if(currentStep>1)handlePrev();},onSwipedRight:()=>{if(canGoNext())handleNext();}});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{...swipeHandlers,ref:containerRef,className:"container page-content",style:{backgroundImage:`url(${backgroundImage})`},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{position:'absolute',top:0,left:0,width:'100%',height:'100%',backgroundImage:`url(${particleGif})`,backgroundSize:'cover',backgroundRepeat:'no-repeat',backgroundPosition:'center',opacity:0.1,pointerEvents:'none',zIndex:-0.5}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"logo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:"\u041B\u043E\u0433\u043E\u0442\u0438\u043F",className:"logo-image"})}),renderStep(),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ScrollIntoView,{options:{behavior:'smooth',block:'end'},children:currentStep<7?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{ref:nextButtonRef,className:`full-width-btn ${canGoNext()?'enabled':'disabled'}`,onClick:canGoNext()?handleNext:undefined,children:"\u0414\u0430\u043B\u0435\u0435"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{ref:nextButtonRef,className:`full-width-btn ${canGoNext()?'enabled':'disabled'}`,onClick:canGoNext()?handleFinish:undefined,children:"\u0417\u0430\u0432\u0435\u0440\u0448\u0438\u0442\u044C \u043E\u043F\u0440\u043E\u0441"})})]});};export default FeedbackPage;
